data_table.description: Physical Examination Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PHEAFLAG
variable.description: PHEAFLAG [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA01
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. Does the participant use wheelchair, crutches or walker? Q1 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA02
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. Does participant walk with cane? Q2 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA03
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. The participant's gait description. Q3 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA03A
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. The participant's gait description. Dystaxic? Q3a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA03B
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. The participant's gait description. Hemiplegic or hemiparetic? Q3b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA04
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. Is there arm weakness? Q4 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA05
variable.description: [Walking/standing]. Rhomberg? Q5 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA06
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Q6 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Coronary bypass. Q7a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Other heart procedure. Q7b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Carotid endarterectomy? Q7c [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07D
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Site of procedure. Q7d [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07E
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Other arterial revascularization? Q7e [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07F
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Specify type. Q7f [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA07G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had surgery on your heart, or on the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for vericose veins? Other. Q7g [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA08
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Have you ever had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart or legs? Q8 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA09A
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. [Probe for type of procedure]. Angioplasty of coronary artery(ies)? Q9a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA09B
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. [Probe for type of procedure]. Angioplasty of lower extremity arteries? Q9b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA09C
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. [Probe for type of procedure]. Cardiac catheterization? Q9c [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA09D
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. [Probe for type of procedure]. Other arterial revascularization? Q9d [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA09E
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. [Probe for type of procedure]. Specify. [ANEURYSM REP, ANGIOGRAPHY, AORTA, AORTA-FEM, BACK AND GRO, BLOCKED ARTE, GRAFT, L FEMORAL, RECONSTRUCTI, REPLACE ARTE, RIGHT FEM/PO, RT LEG, RT THIGH, RT VENOGRAM, RT,LEG, SEE NOTE LOG, VEIN STRIPPI, VENOGRAM RTL]. Q9e [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA09F
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. [Probe for type of procedure]. Other. Q9f [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA10
variable.description: [Neck]. Carotid Bruits? Q10 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA11
variable.description: [Neck]. Other neck or head findings? Q11 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA12
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Rhonchi? Q12 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA13
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Rales? Q13 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA14
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Right lung rales? Q14 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA14A
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Right lung rales basilar? Q14a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA14B
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Right lung rales lower half? Q14b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA14C
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Right lung rales upper half? Q14c [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA15
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Left lung rales? Q15 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA15A
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Left lung rales basilar? Q15a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA15B
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Left lung rales lower half? Q15b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA15C
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Left lung rales upper half? Q15c [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA16
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Other chest findings? Q16 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA17
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Systolic murmur? Q17 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA17A
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Systolic murmur grade. Q17a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA17B
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Systolic murmur location. Q17b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA18
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Diastolic murmur? Q18 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA18A
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Diastolic murmur grade. Q18a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA18B
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Diastolic murmur location. Q18b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA19
variable.description: [Cardio Pulmonary]. Other heart findings? Q19 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA20
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Breast examination? Q20 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA21
variable.description: [Breast Examination].Palpable mass? Q21 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA22
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Right breast mass? Q22 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA22A
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Right breast mass central? Q22a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA22B
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Right breast mass upper outer? Q22b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA22C
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Right breast mass upper inner? Q22c [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA22D
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Right breast mass lower outer? Q22d [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA22E
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Right breast mass lower inner? Q22e [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA23
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Left breast mass? Q23 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA23A
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Left breast mass central? Q23a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA23B
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Left breast mass upper outer? Q23b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA23C
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Left breast mass upper inner? Q23c [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA23D
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Left breast mass lower outer? Q23d [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA23E
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Left breast mass lower inner? Q23e [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA24
variable.description: [Breast Examination]. Other breast findings? Q24 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA25
variable.description: [Lower Examination]. Ankle edema? Q25 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA25A
variable.description: [Lower Examination]. Right ankle edema? Q25a [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA25B
variable.description: [Lower Examination]. Left ankle edema? Q25b [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA26
variable.description: [Lower Examination]. Posterior tibial pulse? Q26 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA27
variable.description: [Lower Examination]. Other extremity findings? Q27 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA28
variable.description: [Lower Examination]. Babinski? Q28 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: PHEA29
variable.description: [General]. Other significant physical findings? Q29 [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Physical Examination Form, exam 1]
